alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 5:31PM MDT until July 07 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OGLALA LAKOTA AND SOUTHWESTERN BENNETT COUNTIES... At 531 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Yellow Bear Canyon to 4 miles north of Wakpamni to 5 miles south of White Clay, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pine Ridge, Martin, Porcupine, Allen, Wounded Knee, Batesland, Wakpamni, Swett, Calico, Wolf Creek Housing, Porcupine Butte Housing and southern Pine Ridge Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
